Name: RevolVR 3
About the game: The third part of a VR franchise enjoyed by millions. It's 01 Space Era. Revolver is the only kind of weapon allowed to be carried by citizens. Gun manufacturers demo their products by allowing gunslingers to upload themselves into robotic bodies and participate in a futuristic Wild West story. You now have the privilege of joining this blood-lusty crowd. Compete against your STEAM FRIENDS online and add bots. Great for parties, great for serious gaming. FEATURES Very simple controls Move like there is no tomorrow! Duck, jump and hide to get the upper hand Multiplayer mode for you and your friends Short, action-packed matches in different levels Meet your friends in the 'saloon', a vast social hub Compete against your friends in the Russian Roulette and Shoot-The-Bottle Fight your way through the ranks to become the most notorious gunslinger there is Challenge the bots to see if your puny human brain can make it INSIDE THE GAME 1 to 6 players inside a match Four characters with different revolvers to choose from Three distinct battle arenas with more coming A social hub with voice chat Mini-games and side entertainment Bring your Steam friends in! ABOUT THE FRANCHISE RevolVR 2 was played by 3 million people in 78 VR parks around the world Now you can experience RevolVR 3 in the comfort of your own very home SOCIAL MEDIA Join our #matchmaking channel on Discord Website has press materials and contacts.
